mapper.insert: insert into article(user_id, label_id, title, html, public_show, delete_flag, add_time, abstract_text, password) values (#{userId}, #{labelId}, #{title}, #{html}, #{publicShow}, #{deleteFlag}, #{addTime}, #{abstractText}, #{password})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, u.username AS author, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as add_time_show, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as update_time_show FROM article AS a INNER JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0
AND a.user_id = #{userId}
AND a.title like concat( '%' , #{title}, '%')
AND a.abstract_text like concat( '%' , #{abstractText}, '%')
ORDER BY a.add_time DESC

SELECT a.*, u.username AS author, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS add_time_show, l.content AS label_content, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS update_time_show, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time, "%Y") AS year, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time, "%m") AS month, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time, "%d") AS day FROM article AS a INNER JOIN user AS u INNER JOIN label AS l ON a.id = #{id} AND a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.label_id = l.id AND a.user_id = u.id
mapper.update: update article set label_id = #{labelId}, title = #{title}, html = #{html}, public_show = #{publicShow}, update_time = #{updateTime}, abstract_text = #{abstractText}, password = #{password} where id = #{id}
update article set delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
